text:
Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu has invited applications from indigent sportspersons for receiving monthly assistance of Rs. 3,000.

The applicants should have completed 58 years of age as on April 1, 2015 and their monthly income should not exceed Rs. 6,000. The applicant should have participated in national or international level tournaments and priority will be given to those who have finished among the top three. Application forms can be had from the office of the District Sports and Youth Welfare Officer, Anna Stadium, by paying Rs.10. Last date for submission of filled-in forms is January 31. Details can be had on 0431-2420685.

Village Games

Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu, Tiruchi, will conduct ‘Village Games’ in 404 village panchayats in the district from January 28 to 30. Athletics, volleyball, and kabaddi will be conducted for men and women. Football will be held only for men. Competitions will be conducted for differently abled persons. Details can be had by dialling 0431-2420685.
title: Applications invited from sportspersons for assistance
